Package emissary.pickup.file

Class FilePickUpPlace

java.lang.Object
emissary.place.ServiceProviderPlace
emissary.pickup.PickUpPlace
emissary.pickup.file.FilePickUpPlace
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPausable, IPickUp, IPickUpPlace, AgentsNotSupportedPlace, IServiceProviderPlace, ServiceProviderPlaceMBean
public class FilePickUpPlace extends PickUpPlace implements IPickUp
Monitor one or more directories and pickup files for the system
